function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Conduct thorough assessments of ventilation systems and air quality to ensure optimal circulation and filtration of indoor air. implement ventilation upgrades and air quality monitoring systems as needed.","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Upgrade hvac system to include cooling and improve air circulation","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reconfigure layout to optimize hygiene and sanitation, implement regular cleaning and disinfection protocols","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Redesign space to optimize open-plan concept, create flexible workspace options","category":"Improve physical health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving indoor climate through temperature control and ventilation","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Education and awareness initiatives on the economic value of indoor climate","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporating economic value of indoor climate into cost-benefit analysis","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement proper ventilation and cooling systems, monitor indoor air quality","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement measures to reduce contamination and heat loads, improve ventilation","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Balancing efficiency with indoor climate quality, monitoring performance and health metrics","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct further research and analysis to confirm the causal relationship","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Careful consideration of the welfare policies and their impact on different income groups","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Developing resilient supply chains, investing in automation, early detection and response plans","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investing in public health infrastructure, global surveillance and monitoring, emergency response planning","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Supplementing with industry-level data, using alternative data sources, conducting qualitative industry research","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement methods to adjust for underestimation and use additional sources of data","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Seek alternative sources of robot data beyond 2018, estimate the impact based on available data","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use alternative proxy variables to capture the impact of pandemics on labor and capital-related data","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Validation of model assumptions and results by domain experts, double-checking of calculations","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thorough documentation of research methodology, clear attribution of data sources, publication of detailed study materials","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investing in pandemic preparedness, healthcare, and support for affected workers","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investing in skill development, retraining programs, universal basic income","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Targeted support for vulnerable groups, revamping education, and new training programs","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Preventing scarring effects on the livelihoods of the most vulnerable, revamping education, and addressing skill
